mapper.sql: bd.id, bd.job_name, bd.app_name, bd.version, bd.project_leader, bd.parameters, bd.start_time, bd.end_time, bd.jenkins_result, bd.queue_id, bd.number, bd.jenkins_log, bd.sonar_result, bd.sonar_output
mapper.insert: insert into build_detail( job_name, app_name, version, project_leader, parameters, start_time, end_time, jenkins_result, queue_id, number, jenkins_log, sonar_result, sonar_output ) values ( #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectLeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parameters,typeHandler=com.channelsoft.ccod.support.cmdb.dao.typeHandler.JsonMapTypeHandler}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jenkinsResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{queueId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jenkinsLog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sonarResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sonarOutput,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
